Posts.Signature: MOMS Journey April06- Emergencysurgery,exploratory,10units blood,largetumor and 10inches of colon removed,temp.colostomy.diagnosed stage IV colon. oxyplatin,5fu Oct06-radiation,surgery,several lymphs,cervix,1 ovary,fallopian,40% remaining colon,large tumor to adipose tissue,appendix,gallbladder removed.permant colostomy/iliostomy oxyplatin,transfusion. April 07-xeloda-overdose surgery-1/3liver,partial diaphra, removed clipped and questionable spots oblated. port-port rejection-port removed 1week. picc line,5fu,oxyplatin,camptosar. Oct-08-surgery-remaining ovary engulfed in tumor,partial bone scrape. transfusion central line TPN 1 month. oct-09-surgery tumor ,colon and jejuneum removed. xeloda reduced. severe dehydration,heart attack. april10-remission-avistan oct-10-erbitux,camptosar Jan-11-5fu mar-11 return to original site-oxyplatin,5fu Aug-11-erbitux,camptosar. dec-28-blood transfusion dec-30-back to chemo erbitux camtosar Jan-16 injections neulasta and aranesp feb16-transfusion feb 21-Tumor found stomach,liver, and liver "hot spots" inflamed lymph in rt ureter in kidney causing obstruction-surgery schedualed Mar 16. march 16/12-no more kidney obstruction not lymph ...dehydration is causing blockage, two litters blood for anemia, stomach liver tumor small-med,abalation, 1 hidden tumor deep in muscle mass on side flank(hid from scans) -gone! june/15/12-blood transfusion starting a regimine of celebrex aug/16/12-blood transfusion aug/30-12 discontinued celebrex -failure one kidney. needed to see urologist sept/10-12-good urologist report one kidney functioning well for now. oct/23/12-chemo pill Stivarga(regorafenib) Nov/22/12-blood transfusion dec/18/12-blood transfusion chemo pill dosage cut back to 1 pill. Feb/21/13 neulasta injection Feb/22/13-blood transfusion. still taking stivarga. mar/20/13-arenespt injection rehydration and magnesium IV mar/21/13-acute renal failure-kidney infection april/1/13.-recovery from 4 day coma infection cleared/4 units blood/ off stivarga/starting rehab therapy, swollen hand no apparent reason black spots in vision off and on. both cleared up. may/22/13-home oxycodone for pain shoulder neck arm june/1/13 pain subsided off oxy onto aleve june/09/13-pain back off aleve on vicodin june 10/13-cancer in back/neck- starting radiation for arm neck and shoulder pain. june24/13-last day of radiation-on steroids july1/13-swollen legs and feet-lasix off steroids still on vicodin and xanax july 23/13 vicodin cut in half blood transfusion. sept/6/13-off all pain meds since late aug scan results fracture in spine mid back sept/12/13-spine healing on its own,weaning off steroids, no visible tumors. nov/7/13-edema both legs and one arm on lasix since oct. nov/21/13- leg edema subsiding still alot in one arm- she is talking but keeps her eyes closed. achy but no major pain. nurse and aide to visit once a week schedualed. having trouble standing. nov/24/13-sadly but peacefully moms cancer journey is at an end, she will start her new spiritual journey together hand in hand with dad.

Posts.Title: A little worried and concerned.... Looking for info.

Posts.Content: sounds to me like theyre thinking it may be a combo of scar tissue and cysts. cyts are very common and come and go at times. some remain without problems-the thing is they want further testing to identifiy the one in the left breast because they couldnt make it out with the mammogram because of the angle(may or may not also be a cyst. They dont want to give a final diagnosis till they can get clearer identification which they will get by the ultrasound. so not great news but not really bad at this point. unfortunately you have to wait again-ubless they can tell you right there after the ultrasound-Im unfamiliar with how that works-you still may have to wait if the doctor hi/he self is not present . Untill they get the paperwork review it and come up with the diagnosis to let you know. hope this explains a bit.

Posts.Content: Lyudmila- sorry you had to have surgery and as far as I understand that the so called sattelites are melenoma spreading- I think you need to go back to your doctor for him to evauate it. you did say they lymph nodes were involved and unfortunately it could mean its metasticising- catch it early. you may be mistaking them for sattelites so to ease your mind-see your doctor .

Posts.Title: Satellites after breast cancer surgery and further lymph node dissection

Posts.Content: bwtoo- since you didnt get the info first hand -the info could have gotten twisted about like most things do.-could have been that she was diagnosed with "possible" / suspected and may not have actually been diagnosed as such. sure healthy eating is important and some possible prevention can occur through diets ,but once its got a hold its not too promising of a solution . I say if the doctors give up and say they can no longer do any more treatments then it doesnt hurt to try anything. The problem with that is one never knows if the body healed itself or the diet actually helped -not enough solid proof. and really I have no further discussion ,material on that- whatever the case its rare but Im glad shes ok.

Posts.Title: possible recurrence?

Posts.Content: Stefani- mom and many others have all kind of weird pains from the treatments -its part of the journey unfortunately- mom has had pain that shoots in different direction then another time sore and fklulike achiness and numbness fatigue and instabiklity when standing. T Most of these symptoms come and go throughout treatment. Some certsin symptoms bother some people more than others no way to predict who when or why. Its definately normal as far as symptoms go. if it becomes unbearable let your doctor know. If the med he gioves you for pain doesnt ease it up-tell him. keep after them untill you get something that makes it bearable. nothings going to mae it go away completely untill treatments are over and even then-it takes time for the chemicals to work out of your system-but in time the pain will diminish. hope this helps answer your question.

Posts.Title: little rash on breast

Posts.Content: jen sorry it took so long for someone to respond-weve been ever so busy here. I havent had any real experience in this type of problems , but when someone gets a chance Im sure they will try to help-in the meantime- all I can tell you if the doctors or radiologists claim its a fatty tissue mass- this can happen anywhere on the body and truly isnt anything to be concerned about unless its giving you a problem- usually they are a type of cyst (in a way) and removal isnt usually necessary unless it became a problem /cosmetic reasons. In some cases fatty tissues come and go and sometimes they will break down and dissapear. other times they just stay where they are. If the doctors were concerned they would have recommended further testing.

Oct-08-surgery-remaining ovary engulfed in tumor,partial bone scrape. transfusion central line TPN 1 month. oct-09-surgery tumor ,colon and jejuneum removed. xeloda reduced. severe dehydration,heart attack. april10-remission-avistan oct-10-erbitux,camptosar Jan-11-5fu mar-11 return to original site-oxyplatin,5fu Aug-11-erbitux,camptosar. dec-28-blood transfusion dec-30-back to chemo erbitux camtosar Jan-16 injections neulasta and aranesp feb16-transfusion feb 21-Tumor found stomach,liver, and liver "hot spots" inflamed lymph in rt ureter in kidney causing obstruction-surgery schedualed Mar 16. march 16/12-no more kidney obstruction not lymph ...dehydration is causing blockage, two litters blood for anemia, stomach liver tumor small-med,abalation, 1 hidden tumor deep in muscle mass on side flank(hid from scans) -gone! june/15/12-blood transfusion starting a regimine of celebrex aug/16/12-blood transfusion aug/30-12 discontinued celebrex -failure one kidney. needed to see urologist sept/10-12-good urologist report one kidney functioning well for now. oct/23/12-chemo pill Stivarga(regorafenib) Nov/22/12-blood transfusion dec/18/12-blood transfusion chemo pill dosage cut back to 1 pill. Feb/21/13 neulasta injection Feb/22/13-blood transfusion. still taking stivarga. mar/20/13-arenespt injection rehydration and magnesium IV mar/21/13-acute renal failure-kidney infection april/1/13.-recovery from 4 day coma infection cleared/4 units blood/ off stivarga/starting rehab therapy, swollen hand no apparent reason black spots in vision off and on. both cleared up. may/22/13-home oxycodone for pain shoulder neck arm june/1/13 pain subsided off oxy onto aleve june/09/13-pain back off aleve on vicodin june 10/13-cancer in back/neck- starting radiation for arm neck and shoulder pain. june24/13-last day of radiation-on steroids july1/13-swollen legs and feet-lasix off steroids still on vicodin and xanax july 23/13 vicodin cut in half blood transfusion. sept/6/13-off all pain meds since late aug scan results fracture in spine mid back sept/12/13-spine healing on its own,weaning off steroids, no visible tumors. nov/7/13-edema both legs and one arm on lasix since oct. nov/21/13- leg edema subsiding still alot in one arm- she is talking but keeps her eyes closed. achy but no major pain. nurse and aide to visit once a week schedualed. having trouble standing. nov/24/13-sadly but peacefully moms cancer journey is at an end, she will start her new spiritual journey together hand in hand with dad.
Posts.Title: Lump under left breast on rib wall

Posts.Content: Gurman- Im sorry you and your aunt are going through this.-Shes already been through a scare and thankfully hasnt had a reoccurance till thenIm sorry no-one has responded with similar condition. I really no-nothing of what your aunt is going through because Ive been focused on moms colon cancer. which is usually the forum Im around. I definately think though. as with any cancer the second opinion is a really good idea before putting her through more treatments. As long as her condition is not emergebt I would go ahead with the retest. I cant ofer ay more advice than that but Im hoping others reading this will have some advice for you. In the meantime I hope all goes well and she will be included in my forum prayers and give it some time for some answers , most of the people here are going through quite alot themselves. keep us posted on how shes doing and if you decide to retest .

Posts.Title: GE junction adenocarcinoma

Posts.Content: coffebean- there is no specific time range if they decide to go- most of them are there for the duration or just pop in and out. some cysts are called fybroid cyst and dont go away the fluid filled can be drained if bothersome or they enlarge and shrink on occasion(especially are aggravated by caffiene) but doesnt mean you cant consume it. remember alot of those things in the breast are glands too-they arent all cysts and tumors and they are all around.
